description: This file defines the SearchProvider class, which manages search state and operations for books within a Flutter application. It interacts with services to fetch search results and notifies listeners of state changes.

classes.name: SearchProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier that manages search state and performs book searches using CatalogService.

methods.name: SearchProvider
methods.description: Constructor initializing CatalogService with provided ApiClient.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Performs a search query, updates the loading state, fetches results, and notifies listeners.

methods.name: clear
methods.description: Resets the search results and query, and notifies listeners.
